import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getCategories } from '../../store/CatgoriesSlice'; import style from './Categories.module.scss' export default function Categories() { let dispatch = useDispatch(); let {categories} = useSelector(state=> state.categories) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getCategories()) }, [dispatch]) return ( <>
) }
